branchCategory.name: Electronic Regulators
branchCategory.description: <p>Electro pneumatic air regulators control air/vacuum pressure steplessly in proportion to an electric signal. They are light weight in design with a bright and easy to read LED display. The monitor output is available either as analog output or switch output.</p>

branchItem.name: ITVX
branchItem.description: <P>Series ITVX2000 high pressure electro-pneumatic regulator provides stepless control of air pressure to an electrical signal.  They have an easy to read digital pressure display and a power consumption of 3 W or less. The new series has a 5.0 MPa maximum supply pressure.</P>

branchItem.name: ITV
VY1
IT
IC
branchItem.description: Series IC, controller for electro-pneumatic regulator converts digital input signal into analog output signal. It has a maximum 10 bit parallel input signal and a 4 point preset output pressure. This series is mainly used in combination with the series ITV0000 w/o a display function.

branchItem.name: PVQ
branchItem.description: <P>PVQ series, compact proportional solenoid valve, was designed by SMC with a direct poppet construction. &nbsp;This construction&nbsp;enables low leakage, while de-energized.&nbsp; PVQ series has been used in applications such as air blow, flow control, hand piece control for dental unit and other respiratory equipment,&nbsp;as well as, cooling for laser machinery etc. </P>

branchItem.name: VEF/VEP
branchItem.description: <P>A proportional control valve system provides the ability to infinitely control the position of the internal spool assembly which increases or decreases the amount of flow or pressure being released from the valve. SMC offers 2 types of proportional control valves, a pressure type VEP which controls secondary pressure by varying the current through the solenoid, and a flow rate type VEF which controls air flow by varying current through the solenoid. </P>

branchItem.name: VER
branchItem.description: The 5 port electro-pneumatic proportional valve, Series VER can be used to switch and actuate a cylinder and to perform stepless pressure control of port A through electric signals.&nbsp; The VER2000 (direct operated type) is available with 1/4 or 3/8 port size.&nbsp; The VER4000 (internal pilot type) and the VER4001 (external pilot type) are available with 3/8, 1/2 or 3/4 port size.&nbsp; Thread types include Rc, G, NPT or NPTF.&nbsp; The VER is also available without a sub-plate.
